name: Meta Connect San Jose
description: Meta Connect (formerly F8) is Meta Platforms’ annual developer conference, focusing on AR, VR, XR, AI, machine learning, frontend and mobile development, UX/UI, product management, cloud computing, innovation, and startups. The conference includes keynote sessions, breakout workshops, technical labs, and networking opportunities for developers and tech enthusiasts. Attendance ranges between 5,000–7,000 in-person participants, with virtual participation worldwide, offering insights into Meta’s latest technologies and tools for building immersive experiences.
